result.execSummary:
The defendant Keith Judd Covill was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Report to Probation before the end of business November5th, 2015

miscConds.notes: comply with any and all counseling recommended by the Agent

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Keith Judd Covill

defendant.name: Covill, Keith Judd
defendant.address: 703 W. Wisconsin St; Rm 14, Portage, WI 53901

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Marquette County DNA Proof of Submission

Defendant Keith Judd Covill in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that he did meet with the defendant and an offer was provided; the parties have resolution.
  Atty Hendee states plea agreement.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney and wants to proceed.    Court finds waiver made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.   Defendant enters a Guilty plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty.

Atty Hendee asks the court to follow the joint recommendation.

BY THE COURT:  Withhold Sentence; 12 months Probation with conditions:
*Court Costs = $243.00 + $100.00 Domestic Abuse Surcharge
*DNA Sample + $200.00 Surcharge
*Comply with any and all counseling recommended by the Agent
Report to Probation before the end of business November 5th.

Pre-trial conference at 10-27-2015 09:00 am.
Return date at 11-04-2015 03:30 pm.

Defendant Keith Judd Covill in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands.  

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

Court questions the defendant.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.    Court finds waiver made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.
BY THE COURT:  Set for Return and Pre-trial.
bond continued.  Return date scheduled for November 4, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.
